EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_Financial Services_Cold_Nurture.FinancialServices_Cold_Nurture_Ent
EmailTemplate.subject: EcoBank Builds a Future Ready Infrastructure with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With operations in over 37 African Countries including rural Rwanda, Sudan, Ghana, Benin, Senegal, Mali, and the Congo, EcoBank must persevere with limited infrastructure.
Watch this video <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/ecobank-turbonomic-turbonomic-customer-success-story/]]> to see how the Pan-African Bank proactively assures the performance of their mission-critical applications following Turbonomic’s decisions, enables automation, and ultimately resolves issues within their infrastructure.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/ecobank-turbonomic-turbonomic-customer-success-story/]]>
The Turbonomic platform is trusted by the 1,900 organizations to optimize performance and cost simultaneously in real-time. Here's what they have to say <[[https://turbonomic.com/customer-reviews/]]>.
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
<[[turbonomic.com]]>
